text: @RandPaul Those people who will possibly pickup & carry covid19 to 20 other people all over the community must stay home. I think you have a fake Dr. License to ignore the CDC as you have. Look at Catholics & jews- they're smart enough to listen to God's angels-stay home: Use TV/internet
